## MutexStorage

<GenerationInfo sourceFile="packages/commandkit/src/utils/useful-stuff/mutex.ts" sourceLine="10" packageName="commandkit" />

Interface for mutex storage implementations.
Provides methods to store, retrieve, and delete mutex lock data.

```ts title="Signature"
interface MutexStorage {
    acquire(
    key: string,
    timeout?: number,
    signal?: AbortSignal,
  ): Promise<boolean>;
    release(key: string): Promise<void>;
    isLocked(key: string): Promise<boolean>;
}
```

<div className="members-wrapper">

### acquire

<MemberInfo kind="method" type={`(key: string, timeout?: number, signal?: AbortSignal) => Promise&#60;boolean&#62;`}   />

Attempts to acquire a lock for a given key
### release

<MemberInfo kind="method" type={`(key: string) => Promise&#60;void&#62;`}   />

Releases the lock for a given key
### isLocked

<MemberInfo kind="method" type={`(key: string) => Promise&#60;boolean&#62;`}   />

Checks if a lock is currently held for a given key


</div>
